projects.title: Neighborhood Learning Lab
projects.description: A pop-up classroom with devices, tutors, and weekend workshops for local youth.

projects.title: Community Solar Garden
projects.description: Shared solar panels for residents who cannot install their own rooftop systems.

projects.title: Mobile Health Clinic
projects.description: Monthly wellness visits and screenings for underserved blocks.

projects.title: After-School Arts Collective
projects.description: Studio space, supplies, and mentorship for emerging community artists.

projects.title: Clean Water Refill Station
projects.description: Install a public water refill kiosk to cut plastic waste and improve access.

projects.title: Neighborhood Food Pantry Fridge
projects.description: A solar-powered community fridge stocked weekly with fresh groceries.

projects.title: Community Tree Canopy Initiative
projects.description: Plant 500 shade trees and fund a year of community-led care and watering.

projects.title: Youth Soccer Equipment Drive
projects.description: Uniforms, cones, and balls for weekly practice in neighborhood parks.

projects.title: Neighborhood Tech Makerspace
projects.description: After-school robotics, design, and coding studio with shared tools and mentors.

projects.title: Clean Water for Rural Schools
projects.description: We aim to provide safe and clean drinking water to rural schools in our region. Donations will help install water filters, repair broken wells, and educate students on hygiene.

feedback.name: Jane Mwangi
feedback.message: Love the platform! Would be great to have email notifications for project updates.

feedback.name: Peter Ochieng
feedback.message: The donation process is smooth. Can we add M-Pesa integration?

feedback.name: Grace Achieng
feedback.message: I've donated to multiple projects and love how transparent the tracking is. Keep it up!

feedback.name: James Kimani
feedback.message: As a regular donor, I'd appreciate a donor dashboard to see all my contributions in one place.

feedback.name: Anonymous
feedback.message: Great initiative for our community. The projects are well organized and easy to browse.

feedback.name: Mary Wanjiku
feedback.message: Can you add a feature to set up recurring monthly donations? Would make it easier to budget.

feedback.name: Andrew Kiptoo
feedback.message: The solar garden project is exactly what our neighborhood needs. Thank you for facilitating this!

feedback.name: Dr. Sarah Okonkwo
feedback.message: As a healthcare professional, I'm thrilled to support the Mobile Health Clinic. Would love to volunteer too!

feedback.name: George Odhiambo
feedback.message: The website loads fast and works well on my phone. Very user-friendly!

feedback.name: Margaret Kemunto
feedback.message: It would be nice to have project updates sent via SMS for those without reliable internet.

feedback.name: Alice Mwikali
feedback.message: The Arts Collective is changing lives! I've seen the kids in my neighborhood flourish because of it.

feedback.name: Quincy Mwangi
feedback.message: Can we get receipts for tax deduction purposes? That would help encourage more donations.

feedback.name: Yusuf Mwangi
feedback.message: The clean water station project is crucial for our area. Thank you for making this possible!

feedback.name: Richard Ouma
feedback.message: My son plays in the youth soccer program. The equipment drive has been a blessing. Asante sana!

feedback.name: Faith Muthoni
feedback.message: I'd love to see more education-focused projects. The Learning Lab is amazing!

feedback.name: Lucy Wambui
feedback.message: The progress bars on each project are motivating! Love seeing how close we are to goals.

feedback.name: Samuel Karanja
feedback.message: Consider adding a leaderboard for top donors. It might encourage friendly competition!

feedback.name: Agnes Chebet
feedback.message: The food pantry fridge has helped so many families in our neighborhood. God bless you all.

feedback.name: Victor Simiyu
feedback.message: Would be great to have WhatsApp sharing buttons for each project to spread the word easier.

feedback.name: Nancy Wangari
feedback.message: The tree planting initiative is wonderful. Our streets are getting greener every month!

feedback.name: Joseph Wekesa
feedback.message: Please add more payment options. Not everyone has a card - M-Pesa would reach more Kenyans.
